languages.text: Тысячи тел слились в замерзшие барханы, покрывая улицы докуда достигает взор. Неясно, образовались они стихийно, или кто-то намеренно сбрасывал трупы в единую груду.

traits.locale_text: Тысячи тел слились в замерзшие барханы, покрывая улицы улья докуда достигает взор. Неясно, образовались они стихийно, или кто-то намеренно складывал трупы.

languages.text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.
languages.original_text: Тысячи тел слились в замерзшие барханы, покрывая улицы докуда достигает взор. Неясно, образовались они стихийно, или кто-то намеренно сбрасывал трупы в единую груду.

traits.locale_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snow drifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether they formed spontaneously or if somebody was purposely dumping corpses onto a single pile.

Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snow drifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether they formed spontaneously or if somebody was purposely dumping corpses onto a single pile.

Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

languages.text: 数以千计的尸体汇聚成了巨大的冰堆，覆盖了视线所及的街道。不知道这些尸体是原本就散落在这里的，还是有人故意把它们堆起来的。
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: 数以千计的尸体汇聚成了巨大的冰堆，覆盖了视线所及的街道。不知道这些尸体是原本就散落在这里的，还是有人故意把它们堆起来的。

languages.text: Miles de cuerpos se han fusionado en los bancos de nieve helados que cubren las calles hasta donde alcanza la vista. No hay forma de saber si estas formaciones son naturales o si alguien ha organizado los cadáveres intencionadamente.
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: Miles de cuerpos se han fusionado en los bancos de nieve helados que cubren las calles hasta donde alcanza la vista. No hay forma de saber si estas formaciones son naturales o si alguien ha organizado los cadáveres intencionadamente.

languages.text: 何千という遺体が凍りついて雪壁を形成し、視界に入る街路を覆っている。自然にできたものなのか、何者かがわざと死体を積み上げたのかは分からない。
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: 何千という遺体が凍りついて雪壁を形成し、視界に入る街路を覆っている。自然にできたものなのか、何者かがわざと死体を積み上げたのかは分からない。

languages.text: Des milliers de cadavres se sont agglutinés pour former des congères, recouvrant les rues à perte de vue. Vous n'arrivez pas à déterminer si la formation s'est faite naturellement ou si quelqu'un a empilé tous ces corps.
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: Des milliers de cadavres se sont agglutinés pour former des congères, recouvrant les rues à perte de vue. Vous n'arrivez pas à déterminer si la formation s'est faite naturellement ou si quelqu'un a empilé tous ces corps.

languages.text: Tausende von Leichen sind zu gefrorenen Schneeverwehungen verschmolzen und bedecken nun die Straßen, so weit das Auge reicht. Unklar ist, ob die Gebilde natürlich entstanden sind, oder ob jemand die Leichen absichtlich gestapelt hat.
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: Tausende von Leichen sind zu gefrorenen Schneeverwehungen verschmolzen und bedecken nun die Straßen, so weit das Auge reicht. Unklar ist, ob die Gebilde natürlich entstanden sind, oder ob jemand die Leichen absichtlich gestapelt hat.

languages.text: Binlerce ceset, donmuş kar yığınlarıyla kaplı hâlde sokaklarda göz alabildiğine uzanıyor. Bunlar doğal bir şekilde mi oluşmuş yoksa birisi bu cesetleri kasten mi bir araya yığmış, orası belli değil.
languages.original_text: Thousands of bodies have merged into frozen snowdrifts, covering streets as far as the eye can see. It is unclear whether the formations occurred naturally or if somebody purposely piled the corpses up.

traits.locale_text: Binlerce ceset, donmuş kar yığınlarıyla kaplanmış ve sokaklarda göz alabildiğine uzanıyor. Bu oluşumlar doğal bir şekilde mi oluşmuş yoksa birisi bu cesetleri kasten mi yığın hâline getirmiş belli değil.
